titleStmt.title: A compendious introduccion, prologe or preface vn to the pistle off Paul to the Romayns
Compendious introduccion, prologe or preface un to the pistle off Paul to the Romayns.
titleStmt.author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.

notesStmt.note: Largely a paraphrase, sometimes a literal translation, of: Luther, Martin. Praefatio in Epistolam Pauli ad Romanos.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
